name: Rebirth! New Lover
description: Song Xuan unexpectedly traveled to ancient times, where he met several emotional partners who sincerely treated him. There are Qing'er,Xiaobai, Gu Qiuhan,Lin Miaoxian and Mingyue Rao. He had so many humorous and sweet love stories with them.

name: Savior Quest
description: "Savior Quest" is an ARPG with a behind the scenes perspective. By taking missions in the main city and challenging various powerful boss, players can obtain random equipment with various entries.

name: Unreal Wukong
description: " Unreal WuKong" is an open-world action RPG based on the classic Chinese mythological novel, "Journey to the West." You will play as the Monkey King, Sun Wukong, embarking on a perilous and wondrous adventure to save the world by vanquishing demons that have traveled from the future.

name: Beauty vs. Zombie
description: In this tower defense game, players defend homes of beauties from zombies. With diverse girl characters, each with unique skills, players strategically deploy defenses, face bosses, and cooperate in multiplayer. Courage and wit lead to victory in "Battle of Beauties vs Zombies"!

name: Lightracer: For Judge
description: In a dystopian future, as The Judge with immense power, you journey through space to find hope in a divided society. This sci-fi adventure explores hope amidst adversity.

name: Madness
description: Arcade combat racing game with physics defying stunts Inspired by Burnout, FlatOut, and Need For Madness?

name: Sword & Seek
description: Sword and Seek is a cozy fantasy hidden object game set in a medieval world, where players embark on a journey to receive the blessing of the goddesses to become adventurers.

name: Dual Eclipse
description: Delve into mysterious dungeons and discover a way to restore order to the cosmos in this trick-taking dungeon crawler. Evade traps, discover secrets, and strategize with unique trick-taking combat. Change the tide of battle with powerful eclipse cards, strengthen your deck, and parry cards!

name: Ninja Monkey
description: Battle waves of bees, choose upgrades each round, and defeat challenging bosses. Unlock new classes, maps, weapons, and abilities while refining your build and mastering platforming skills!

name: Pirate Hunter: Somali Trap
description: In the middle of the South Pacific: modern pirates are making the waterways that are so important for international trade unsafe. In order to deal with this ever-growing threat, a mercenary group called The Pilgrims appears on the scene, earning their money with protection missions...

name: BeYourCat
description: "Be Your Cat " is a real love game,like an experience in life, one interesting dream. We all wish we had superpowers, but what would you do if one day you had superpowers, but not like Superman? What will you do with your limited abilities? How does it affect and change the people around you?

name: Click Painter
description: Click Painter is a Minesweeper-like puzzle game with colorful pictures, comfortable rest, and new ideas.

name: Darwin
description: Enter a tough-as-nails retro old school trip, Darwin is a daunting gauntlet of a speedrunning platformer. It requires the player to move fast and be agile, but to also be prepared to die. Again. Again. And again. Can you survive the trials in Slugtopia, defeat the nasty Wormilon, and make it home?

name: Spaceman
description: Conquer the heights of space by navigating treacherous landscapes. Battle gravity and test your skill to reach the top. Get ready for the climb of your life.

name: Chiral
description: A sci-fi dark-comedy puzzle game. In Chiral, you'll assume the role of a disembodied brain in a jar, paired with a digital AI companion. Together, you'll navigate a labyrinth of mirror, laser, and gravity puzzles that will challenge your spatial reasoning and leave you both laughing and bewildered.

name: The White Room
description: Locked in the white room and you are slowly losing your mind. Not sure what is real anymore and you must escape.

name: Into the M.A.W.
description: In this action-packed co-op adventure, four players must unite to crew a spaceship through a web of interconnected story missions. Choose your role—Captain, Pilot, Gunner, or Engineer—and make decisions that shape not only your journey, but the future of a galaxy on the brink of war.

name: GreenWood Defense
description: Defend your captain using units to fight off invading frogs. Level up your units to unlock their new abilities, purchase upgrades, and gain special abilities to win battles against the invaders.

name: Evoplasm
description: Evolve and fight in this creature building Roguelike. Grow a creature by attaching new cells, add mutations to create powerful synergies, fight real-time tactical battles against weird enemies, and strategically choose a path across multiple campaign acts. Inspired by games like Spore and FTL.

name: Age of Defense: Prehistory
description: The most addicting tower defense game, packed with monsters and tough defenders, all of which fit perfectly into the cartoonish environment. Prehistory is a prologue for the main story Age of Defense.

name: Cosplay Crisis: Succubus Invasion
description: Cosplay Crisis is an Action roguelite bullet heaven with an animecon theme. A Succubus, intent on winning the Convention's cosplay competition, charms the men in attendance to destroy her competition. Now the girls must take up arms to protect their costumes, or be stripped and sent home blushing!

name: TCG Card Shop Simulator
description:
Open your own local game store. Stock shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them and collect the cards for yourself. Set your own prices, hire staff, host events, and expand your card shop.

TCG Card Shop Simulator is a trading card shop simulation where you sell card booster packs to earn money and build your card shop business.

name: Kemopop!
description: Fast puzzles, cute boys~! A food-themed physics puzzler where you undress your waiter. A kemono game, by kemono artists.

name: Backrooms The Company
description: backrooms horror game

name: Temporal Titans
description: Temporal Titans is a Tower-Defense game with Time Travel. Send mechs back to previous waves to prevent your defeat, and protect your salvage team from the monstrous Krell as you scavenge the ruins of a lost earth. Rewind, rethink, and reclaim the future!

name: I'm Not Crazy
description: I'm Not Crazy is a surreal top down puzzle adventure game. Solve puzzles, explore and play micro games.

name: Short Snow
description: SHORT SNOW! Realistic open-world survival experience, you find yourself lost in a vast, snow-covered forest after a harrowing plane crash. With temperatures plummeting and hunger gnawing at you, will you succumb to the forces of nature, or will you conquer the frozen wilderness? The choice is yours!

name: Yokai Rescue
description: Ascend through a futuristic tower in this fast-paced action platformer. Use your Yokai abilities to move swiftly in the air and pierce through your enemies to defeat them. You are the last Yokai capable of saving your people and liberating your homeland from the Selvo robot control.

name: Fish
description: you click fish to get fish.

name: Gravity Sphere
description: Gravity Sphere is a 3D puzzle game where you use gravity fields to manipulate and guide projectiles through increasingly difficult levels. Strategize, aim, and solve challenging puzzles in a futuristic, physics-based environment.

name: Carl und Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt
description: Jump into Carl and Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt, an interactive educational game in which you have to help Tierstadt and its animal inhabitants with their jobs in order to save the big town festival. Get to know different training jobs and their training opportunities in a playful way.

name: Police Atv Offroad
description: Welcome back, Lieutenant. Today marks a new chapter in your career as a police officer.

name: Tidy Backpack
description: Tidy Backpack is a relaxing puzzle game where you must organize found fantasy loot in your backpack in a tidy way. Find forgotten artifacts and learn details about the old world... at least supposedly!

name: W.O.T.E: Waking On The Endtimes
description: Embark on this journey with W.O.T.E, an action-adventure game with simple and captivating visuals. Norah is in a world overrun by strange creatures, full of challenges, secrets to uncover, collectibles to find, and missions to complete to restore peace. Available in Portuguese (BR) and English.

name: FFS, Another Northern Duke?!
description: There's only one goal here: survive. Seduce the Duke?! Expelled from the modern world into a novel, you occupy the body of a minor villainess, on her way to marry the beastly Duke of the North. (Why does that sound familiar...) A Fantasy + Romance + Slice-of-Life Otome Visual Novel.

name: Barrok
description: An arcade racing game in which you try to be first by beating other competitors.

name: PolyDrift
description: Free demo available with 4 first levels Prepare to immerse yourself in the neon-soaked world of drift racing mastery. Customize your ride, perfect your technique, and chase the ultimate thrill of the drift. The leaderboard awaits - will you rise to the challenge and claim your place among the elite?

name: Spammerina
description: Ever wanted to just Spam a bunch of Spells? Discover and Enhance your new favourite spells to slay a myriad of monsters! Loot, Explore, and Uncover the Secrets of The Dark Continent! Blast beasts with Blood magic, Divine Judgement, and more! The Dark Continent is waiting...

name: Kombat Hamster
description: Kombat Hamster is an idle clicker simulation game. Grow your empire to get more hamster coins in the fairest business simulator.

name: Project Unknown Designation
description: Meet your friends at their cabin in the woods. What lies ahead?

name: Swordia
description: Traverse Swordia, a community-driven MMORPG with skill-based progression, PVP, PVE, and endless possibilities. Inspired by the classics, experience a mix of dungeon crawling, farming, mining, and more. Help development with your choices and feedback.

name: Yin-Yang Ping-Pong
description: Something to look at.

name: Guru Guru
description: Guru Guru is an 8-player physics-based party game. You and your friends become round and adorable GuruGuru monster, unleashing wild combo moves and smashing your opponents, or YOUR FRIENDS!

name: Turte
description: Turte is a simple yet engaging game where players click on a turtle to increase their score. With straightforward mechanics and an easy-to-understand interface, Turte offers an enjoyable experience for players of all ages.

name: Kioku
description: Reclaim the memories you lost, fight for what is rightfully yours. Explore worlds that seem familiar but not quite. You progress through places that resembles memories you once had. Push forward until you find the reason you're here.

name: Tempter
description: "Tempter" is a suspenseful first-person horror game that shows how humans can be even more dangerous than demons when they gain power. It centers on the struggle to save one's soul against a demon after breaking a pact.

name: Lusófona Games Collection 2024
description: Lusófona Games Collection 2024 is a curated bundle showcasing the best student projects developed during the past academic year at Lusófona University. Play the games and take a behind-the-scenes look at our students' journey to becoming the next generation of videogame developers.

name: Wanted: Yokai Uprising
description: Wanted: Yokai Uprising is a cooperative first-person shooter. Take down waves of yokai solo or with a partner. Choose between two mercenaries with unique play styles to complete the mission assigned to you and defeat the city's most wanted boss.

name: Realpolitiks 3: Earth and Beyond
description: Prove your political brilliance in a grand strategy like no other: pick any contemporary country, set up your government and navigate the pitfalls of domestic and international politics. A glorious destiny awaits - the domination of not just the Earth, but the whole Solar system!

name: Supercells
description: A tower defense game featuring a war between human cells and bacteria.

name: Exposure Office Simulator
description: Exposed Office Simulator is an office touching game. By touching the breasts and other parts of the body, the game makes you feel as if you are touching them, as you become animated by touching them.

name: The Rolling Room
description: Unleash your creativity in "The Rolling Room," the ultimate design and decorating game! Transform ordinary rooms and unique spaces like camper vans and buses with stunning realism.

name: Metal Bunny
description: Feel the thunderous beats in your bones and let the electrifying guitar riffs guide your way. It's not just a game, it's a headbanging adventure!

name: Jellies of the Deep
description: Explore a dreamy, hand-drawn world where little deep-sea jellies roam. Jellies of the Deep is a relaxing, hidden object and spot-the-difference game in one.

name: Keyboard Souls
description: Oh my friend, are you one of the strongest typists in the world? Come and try this typing rouge shooting game, practice and become more stronger. Finally you will prove yourself.

name: Mad & Max: The Best Survival Game with Zombies and Dinosaurs
description: Welcome to the Apocalypse! Do dinosaurs rule the earth? Not only them, but also zombies! Why? Because they can.

name: Itsy
description: Itsy is a heart tug the length of a bus ride. A narrative climb up the waterspout about the struggles of Autism-burnout. Play for story (progress saves), or endlessly & conquer the leaderboard. You ever felt endlessly stuck? So has the Itsy Bitsy Spider. Together, can you both help him out of it?

name: Moon Tower
description: Play as a mechanical being, defeat all enemies, and retrieve the crucial item. Moon Tower is a fast-paced game where you must constantly dodge enemies and eliminate them within each room. Gain different abilities to strengthen yourself and enhance your power.

name: Anoxia Station
description: After a supervolcano eruption, Earth has become uninhabitable and humanity is on the brink of extinction. We need to go underground. Anoxia Station is a dark strategy game in which you manage a mining station and fight for survival, extract resources and take life or death decisions over your crew.

name: Obi3011
description: This is cyberpunk themed, pixelated love adventure text game. A rainy encounter and an inevitable cohabitation lead to a journey of mistaken identity. As a robot, your funny love adventure story with your beastmen partners unfolds from here.

name: Avian Enigma
description: Avian enigma is a sci-fi visual novel game featuring in a world where birds have become extinct. The story begins with a young man working in a factory accidentally saves a bird. Soon, a girl who has a mysterious relationship with birds appears in front of him. A romance with a tiny twist begins.

name: The Last Ramparts
description: Humanity Has Been All But Destroyed. Find The Last Remaining Few And Protect Them. Discover Unknown Places Along The Way.

name: Bodega
description: Bodega is an immersive tycoon where the options are limitless. Take charge of many small bodegas located across 1990s NYC to satisfy customers from all walks of life. Accompanied by a bodega cat, you and your companion will overcome any challenge thrown at you.

name: Two Broken Mirrors
description: Classic survival horror with a twist. The whole mansion is ALIVE!. Will you get out or will it get you?.

name: Aesthetic Clicker
description: Aesthetic Clicker is not your average clicker game! Click the sun to get collectable items from time to time.

name: The Last Hollow
description: Step into the mysterious world filled with secrets, puzzles, and challenging paths. Embrace your destiny as the chosen hollow from a forgotten dark land to save dark hollows waiting for salvation.

name: Until Oblivion
description: Until Oblivion is an atmospheric narrative game that follows 17 year old nobody Emma Wilson as she tries to rekindle a dying relationship in a dying world. Join her in an increasingly nightmarish Halloween party and find out if anything (or anyone) is worth anything at all.

name: Bigfoot Life
description: A simulator game where you live life as Bigfoot. Catch fish, forage for mushrooms and berries, build shelters, and more. Survive and live your best Bigfoot Life.

name: Izgub 2001
description: You decide how a civil war in the country of Izgub is supposed to end. Visual novel with strong themes of war, political violence and moral dilemma.

name: Skeletal Skism 2
description: War rages on between the undead... All for one sole purpose: to determine the ONE - TRUE - SKELETON - KING. Do you have what it takes to claim the crown?

name: Oceanlust: Erotic Descent
description: Who can say no when the opportunity of a lifetime drops into their lap? A submarine tour of the world’s most famous shipwreck alongside the sexiest girl you’ve ever met. Sure, there were a lot of waivers to sign but it’ll be fine. They know what they’re doing… Right...?

name: Hour of Survival: Zombie Craft
description: Navigate a post-apocalyptic world, where every decision can mean life or death. Scavenge for food, water, and supplies to keep your character alive in the face of constant danger.

name: Haunted Elevator
description: Play as a photographer compelled by a haunted elevator to uncover a tragic story. Find dark secrets about your company, using your camera and choices to seek justice or follow a darker path. The outcome is in your hands.

name: Tempus Triad
description: In Tempus Triad, dive into an ancient first-person horror scenario where a scientist is thrust into an era where huge predators dominate the land.

name: Too Angry To Die
description: Take control of Gideon Rageblade in this action-filled clicker game. Click to destroy endless waves of enemies, face epic bosses, and earn unique drops. Embrace the rage and irony in a quest that proves dying once was just a fluke—he's too angry to die again.

name: Love in Space
description: It is the year 2009. A short time after "the incident". Mankind has fled the scorched crusts of planet earth for a better life in space. Those unlucky few who still reside on earth are forced to live beneath the sea in leaky metal domes. This includes you... 50% Visual Novel - 50% Karaoke-Musical.

name: The Nick
description: A horrific adventure where you play as Nick, who needs to find a way out of an abandoned mansion. Will you be able to unravel all the secrets this place holds and still stay alive...?

name: Corn
description: Corn — the interactive clicker featuring America's favorite fruit, brought to you by the developer of Cuckold Simulator. Buy corn, collect corn, trade corn. We love corn!

name: Day Off: Moonriver Incident
description: An atmospheric 2D top-down shooter with an open world and physics. Step into the role of a police officer from an old horror movie. Discover what happened in the town of Moonriver. Use your brain against zombies - create barricades with the furniture, stay quiet, or unleash full-blown action!

name: Huntin' Ducks
description: Arcade shoot-em-up roguelike with a unique combo mechanic. Variety of items to choose from. Endless, play as long as you can survive.

name: The Test Game
description: Escape from an abandoned island by collecting points, food, and resources. Fight to survive. Discover the underwater world and get the best high score to unlock various in game achievements. The Test Game, my first game ever!

name: Inspection Report
description: Inspection Report is a horror / point & click game focused on exploration and dialogue. Fulfill your duties as a building inspector and uncover the secrets of an abandoned property in total dark using only a flashlight.

name: Fluffy Sailors
description: Fluffy Sailors is a charming roguelite adventure where you engage in thrilling sea battles, shooting your fluffy crew onto the ships of other animal pirates.

name: On a Journey RPG
description: A Golden-Age of 2D JRPG's returns with Turn-Based Combat & Retro-Inspired Graphics! Adventure across the world, meet new friends and unlock powerful Summon Monsters as you battle against a truly formidable enemy in this Story-Rich JRPG

name: DinoTribe
description: Create your dino chief, lead your tribe. Survive waves of enemies, explore and settle on foreign islands. Find a way to avoid extinction!

name: Lunar Nightmare
description: Lunar Nightmare is a retro-inspired sci-fi thriller, set on an abandoned Moon base, where you have to solve the mystery behind missing crew members, ancient discoveries around deep down the Lunar surface, rouge-AI trying to control your fate and ghastly androids to revolting against your command.

name: Sim Solver
description: With the help of a companion, the program charged with running these simulations. You'll debug viruses by solving puzzles, shooting your way through hostile code, platforming around any number of obstacles, and exploring areas for key items that take you deeper into the simulation!

name: Glowie Rammer
description: The glowies are out to get you! You just run them over, that's what you do. Fast-paced racing meets spine-chilling horror. In this endless runner, you are not just racing against time but also against the ones who glow in the dark.

name: Collectibles!
description: Collectibles! — a true paradise for collectors! Collect unique items, share them with friends, and show off your achievements on the leaderboards!

name: Fast Car
description: if you know the words, you can join in too

name: Cut the Birch
description: Take on the role of a hero whose main task is to cut down birch trees and destroy enemies. Use an axe and magic to do this. Acquire items and improve skills.

name: Orbit
description: The protagonist robot, Nico, explores a ruined planet and uncovers its hidden secrets.

name: Robin: The Twisted Timber Trail
description: Join Robin and navigate narrow wooden paths, solve puzzles, and help animals and villagers as you uncover hidden trails and secrets.

name: Defend 99
description: DEFEND 99 is a rogue-lite tower defense game with deckbuilding and autochess elements. Place your turrets, roll for upgrades and balance your economy in the hope of defending your network of the elite from an array of digital attackers. Can you hold off all ninety nine waves?

name: Scad
description: Scad is an action packed roguelite apocalypse adventure. Fight against zombie hordes, craft & upgrade new weapons and prepare for new missions.

name: Asylum Revenge
description: "Asylum Revenge is an action and horror game set in an asylum. Players will follow Jessie Frost on her quest for revenge."

name: Paw Paw Death Festival
description: A simple job to execute sinners in a surrealistic way! Three casual party modes for free thinking and creative dark humor + with a great ridiculous comment function to get the audience together on your live streaming.

name: City Park Play Date
description: City Park Play Date is a kinetic (linear) short story. It is a true AVN, but linear by design, telling a very specific story. You play as James, the protagonist of our story. James is lucky in life, but not in love. Our story explains how that changes for him and opens his eyes to what is possible.

name: Echoes of Dread
description: Echoes Of Dread is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore the mansion, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets hidden within. Prepare for unexpected encounters with terrifying entities. The game features an intense atmosphere, non-linear storytelling, and unique moments of horror.

name: Gwihyang: Homecoming
description: "Gwihyang" captures the traditional image of Korea, giving it a new experience. A tense adventure unfolds in which you escape the threat of monsters in the changing space and use items to escape. Hope you can enjoy fear and fun at the same time through this "Gwihyang" with Korean sentiment.

name: Influencer Boxing
description: Step into the ring with "Influencer Boxing," a thrilling game featuring 12 of your favorite social media stars. Each influencer brings their unique style and charisma to intense boxing matches, set in dynamic, visually stunning arenas

name: Taking the Cross
description: Taking the Cross allows you to control Christian Armies fighting for the holy land, inflict crushing defeats on your enemies and win glory for the faith!

name: Geometry Dabs: Save the World
description: Geometry Dabs, a dangerous drug, has brainwashed countless individuals into becoming mindless slaves for its creator, RopTob. The exact purpose of RopTob's control over these victims remains unclear, but it surely cannot be anything good. Your goal is to rescue these people from RopTob

name: Spinners
description: Spinners. You get dropped a spinner every 2 hours 5 times per day. Each spinner is also made by the community in Discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something fantastic. Compete with friends, win the most unique item and become a spin master!

name: Game of Squares
description: Squares is a pattern matching 2D game inspired by the Rubik's cube,. Customise the game's rules to your liking. Challenge yourself by getting faster.

name: Net.Crawl
description: Net.Crawl is a puzzle rogue-like about White Rabbit lost in the unfriendly cyberspace. Dive deep into the bizarre digital world and outsmart dozens of unique Cores(mini-bosses). Short runs, deep strategies, crazy combos and a ton of replayability.

name: The Adventure of Popo
description: Join the adorable polar bear Popo on his adventure! Use shakes strategically to evade enemies and collect hints to overcome obstacles. Will Popo safely reach the polar bear village?

name: Ball In The Box
description: Move platforms to get the ball into the box in a challenging minimalist physics puzzle

name: Nitro Champagne Tower
description: Let's build a champagne tower with glasses filled with liquid explosives. It's the only way to repay a debt of $1,000,000. ...Really?

name: Anomalous Adventure
description: Slay monsters and explore procedural worlds in this old school hack and slash Mini-RPG set in a fantasy world. Battles are a combo of turn based and real time elements. Block enemy attacks and enhance your own using active abilities.

name: Market Master Simulator
description: Take charge of a bustling supermarket in Market Master Simulator. Manage staff, inventory, and product creation while mastering advanced energy systems. Navigate challenges in this dynamic simulation game now in Early Access.

name: Inertial Craft
description: "Inertial Craft" is a simple-to-operate racing game in a cyber world. You can experience a thrilling race with the strong and inertial behavior unique to a craft floating off the ground. Enjoy unique behavior and UI for each craft.

name: GymBro
description: GymBro – is a clicker game that immerses you in the world of sports and lets you click a kettlebell! Quickly join our community, play the mini-game where the main object is a kettlebell, change its appearance through the inventory, and earn rewards... Of course, in the form of kettlebell skins!

name: Lefty
description: A cozy 3D puzzle game where Lefty, a left-handed character, navigates whimsical mazes by only moving to the right. Experience unique mechanics, culturally inspired gameplay, and increasing puzzle complexity, perfect for fans of casual, cozy, and puzzle games.

name: Deliberate
description: In this game, you're transported into a mystical forest brimming with the whimsical charm of cartoonish pixel art.

name: Lore of the Frog
description: You are a frog archaeologist on a journey to the elusive Frog island. Cozy hiking adventure in a magical forest with casual puzzles, ancient frog statues... And put hats on frogs!

name: Exit Station 7
description: You entered a train station and appear to be stuck in a loop. Multiple levels to test your observation skill. See if you have what it takes to escape the loop!

name: Minced
description:
Explore the Minced Meat Processing Co. facility, a place drenched in darkness, secrecy, and dread. Your mission: uncover the chilling secrets hidden within. But beware, meaty entities are prowling the shadows, and you must avoid them at all costs.

Solve puzzles, gather clues, and piece together the factory's nightmarish history to find out what really went wrong...

name: Self-Portrait, Vomit on Concrete
description: Self-Portrait is a short interactive fiction game about a woman dealing with panic attacks and intrusive thoughts on the day after her birthday.

name: Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time"! Choose your character and travel through different universes to defeat the forces of evil, the enemy is waiting to beat you up! Try the best controls for platform games. Jump over obstacles to pass the level. Fight against a multitude of enemies in different scenarios. Escape from the rolling stone down the hill. Ride the pig and dodge the thugs. Talk to the characters to defeat the final boss. BEWARE, the enemy wants to trick you, don't fall into his traps. Prove that you are the chosen one!

name: Secrets of Merveille Castle
description: In this case, you play as detective Felix Pursuit (he's so cool), investigating a castle that's been repurposed to a theater, after he learned that a master criminal and also his arch nemesis... plans to pay the place a visit. Time to uncover secrets.

name: Botan's Bird Beats
description: Botan's Bird Beats is a fanmade game based on Shishiro Botan. The game has you play as Shishiro Botan and you shoot birds in beat to the songs playing.

name: Soucha Yi Ke
description: Sin descripción

name: Maya Fey: Medium Attorney
description: When Maya Fey went to visit her friend Nick, Maya never expected that a crime would be committed the day she arrived, and even less expected the identity of the accused, so the Medium enters the courtroom to save the day...

name: Ace Attorney: The Incomplete Story
description: Delve into a story written by prestigious lawyers Mia Fey and Phoenix Wright. A story that revolves around a young girl lost in the world and without support, Lila, all with a common enemy: a prosecutor with a desire for revenge, Adrian Alterio. Full of new characters, science and mechanics. The Incomplete Story follows the timeline of the Ace Attorney games, mainly in 2019 (after the last T&T case, although with jumps in the timeline).

name: Poketale
description: It's been 70 years since Frisk freed the monsters from Underground. However, the monsters are no longer the same: after an event in which a light illuminated all of Ebottia, all the weak monsters were transformed into Pokémon, causing society to have to adapt to the new creatures without intelligence and with powers beyond their control. all understanding. Can you discover the secret of transforming monsters into Pokémon and become the new Champion of Ebottia?

name: Combat 3
description: Combat 3 was an online FPS playable in the web browser using the Unity3D engine.

name: Anima De Machina
description:
The world, so cruel, cares not for your mind
Although you've traveled far
But when lost, look at the sky and find
A guiding northern star

name: Prayers a Thousand-fold
description: Short little cinematic. Some origami creatures get into some shenanigans. Probably.

name: Turnabout Detectives
description: Turnabout Detectives is a big ol' tale that features Detective Gumshoe as the defendant! However, the plot twists and turns and soon things are a lot worse for more than just Gumshoe...

name: Turnabout Detectives Redux
description: A remake of Turnabout Detectives, with new a script, improved audio and visuals.

name: NBA In The Zone
description:
All the real NBA teams and players combined with great gameplay and fluid 3D texture mapped polygon graphics provide the most realistic basketball game experience yet.
With eight seconds on the clock, you pickpocket Harper, pass the ball to teammate Nick Anderson, who drives to the three-point line and nails a shot at the buzzer for a one point victory over the Knicks. You've just broken your first sweat playing "NBA In the Zone"!

name: Gloomy Detective and Devil Girl
description: 15 year old Haruta Ichihara conducts a ritual to summon the demon girl Lyrae, not seeking her services or power, but desiring for his soul to be consumed. However, instead of complying, Lyrae proposes assistance to Haruta—not through soul consumption, but by unraveling the murder he’s been accused of.

name: Turnabout Mugging
description: Turnabout Mugging is about the intense faceoff between Dougal Justice, a rookie defense attorney who is defending his first case, and Alexander Chevalier, a determined prosecutor who always believes in his witnesses.

name: Turnabout in the Spotlight
description: If you were suddenly thrust into the spotlight, would you shine or would you fizzle out?

name: Max Jefht: Ace Attorney
description: In Max Jefht: Ace Attorney, you play as Max Jefht, an experienced defense attorney considered as a prodigy. Throughout this series, his convictions will be put to the test. Have no doubt, however, that he takes his job very seriously.

name: Erinaceinae Griminance
description: You walk into your dimly, yet surprisingly well lit, office after completing another case. Just as you think your work is over for today and you might finally have time to rest, a new client knocks away your dreams of relaxation and presents you a case unlike any you have seen before.

name: The Impossible Turnabout
description: Phoenix Wright is knocked out by a brick, waking up in a hospital, he wakes up to find out what happened to the case in his absence...

name: That time I got reincarnated as a fictional Defence Lawyer in an Ace Attorney fangame and had to defend myself against incredibly unfair odds.
description: Samallama goes on trial for not submitting an entry to the Red Truth comp, because it's impossible to make an entry in time.

name: Trucy's Magical Catastrophe
description: Welcome one, welcome all to a fast-paced rapid tale about the aftermath of one of Trucy Wright's many illustrious Christmas Shows! With presents galore and a sparkle of magic in the air, there's always fun to be had, cheer to be spread... and horror, when gifts go wrong! Join Trucy and her handy no-name sidekick Apollo whose a legal aide or something boring on their adventure to prevent a magical catastrophe!

name: Colton Owen: After All's Over
description: A young law student and his mentor take on a test case surrounding an impossible murder, when it's revealed that there's more than meets the eye. Join Colton as he uncovers the mystery behind the company that started it all.

name: Last Chance for Turnabout
description: A cold case, a suicide, and a murder intersect. The man at the apex of it all takes on an impossible defence.

name: Turnabout Trickery
description: Taking place in the canon of Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney.

name: Angela Light: Ace Attorney
description: Angela Light debuts as a defense attorney with her own younger brother as her client. Dedicated to winning the case at any cost, Angela encounters a dark sign of her past that makes her take rash decisions...

name: Turnabout Imperfect
description: A short narrative game foused on Franziska.

name: Halloween Hero
description: The story of one child's attempt to reclaim their lost Halloween.

name: Sclash: Sakura
description: Spring is here, and with it sakura petals as sharp as steel. Unlocks a sakura-themed weapon and mask to use in the game.

name: Ruins of Endoth
description: Third-Person ARPG set in a dark fantasy world. Fight enemies, collect random loot, level-up and explore the World of Endoth. Forge your destiny amongst it's heroes!

name: Some Heroines Climb Up a Tower to Ask God Why the Game Has a Name That's So Long
description: In this erotic turn-based strategy rogue-like, make it to the final boss by pushing and pulling your way through a relentlessly difficult horde of God’s demonic angels. Get new sets of class skills every single run and master them to combo your enemies back into the afterlife.

name: Tidal Nexus Online
description: Tidal Nexus Online is a submarine themed old school open world MMO. Fight with monsters, trade and collect valuables in the depths to upgrade your sub. Join clans, participate in world events, make friends and enemies along the way.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attornauts
description:
The law has changed.
The year was 202X. Humanity has expanded into the depths of the solar system. For many, Earth is but a distant memory told in stories. One colony, the brave souls who defended their clients, were determined in soul combat by the “atonauts,” who manipulated barristers with their soul lives, and the verdict of the law was considered too great to be handled by the mere replacement of mechanical weapons called “barristers". In neo-Old Tokyo, the legal system was burdened with the word.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Touhou Mystia's Izakaya Collab "Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again"
description: A collaboration between 『Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost』 & 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 is here! The in-game music 『Beneath the Purple Cherry Blossoms Once Again』 from the popular restaurant simulator 『Touhou Mystia's Izakaya』 will be playable in this new added content. Don't you miss it!

name: One Minute To Close
description: 1 Minute to Close is a stealth adventure game set in a supermarket after hours. Utilize the environmental interactions and physics based tactics to outsmart the shop assistants who use an advanced AI that learns from your actions.

name: Undead Inc.: Worky DLC
description: Unlock a Director: Weaponized Worky. A customized version of Worky's Office Rentals' Robot Receptionist by the same name, Weaponized Worky has come to work really hard and punch stuff sometimes.

name: Box Bakery
description: This is a simulation management game for baking bread. You need to earn more coins by continuously selling bread to animals customer, thus unlocking more types of ingredients and other rarer animals.Unlock more of their stories and collect items as well as stickers to learn the stories behind them.

name: TunTun
description: COME ON DOWN!! If you live for chaotic numskully activities while trying to survive with your pals, then the tunnels might be right for you.

name: Dice with the Devil 2
description: Out-luck your opponents in Dice with the Devil 2, a horror themed deckbuilder where you unlock and collect special dice, customise them, and strategize your best hand of 3 to win your opponents' souls.

name: SwingHard
description: A Dark Fantasy Boss Rush game that will give you a real workout. Swing Hard to do damage. Parry by accurately aiming your weapon. Dodge by moving your body. Squat To Move options for those with limited space. Swing hard, move often, you'll need to exercise your mind and body to win.

name: Chrono Ark: Summer Twilight
description:
Summer-themed DLC for Chrono Ark, featuring a new, optional boss with her own substory, new equipment and relics, as well as swimsuit skins for Lucy and 5 investigators, with accompanying VFX.

The investigators obtaining a new skin are Azar, Charon, Huz, Pressel and Trisha, with Sizz slated to receive one in a future content update.

name: Prism Hotel Murder Case: Super Mystery Wars - Episode Conan
description: In the Prism Hotel Murder Case, you follow the attempts of a genius detective called Conan to solve a bizarre and seemingly impossible murder at the Prism Hotel. This case is strictly an investigation. You will gather evidence, interview witnesses, clash theories with other detectives, and find the truth. It will feel like you're playing through a Detective Conan/Case Closed episode.

name: Hope Springs Hotel: Whisper Of Winter
description: April, 2017. Phoenix Wright, a rising defense attorney, arrives at a remote inn called Hope Springs Hotel after receiving a mysterious letter. Once there, Wright finds himself embroiled in a mystery of lies, betrayal and murder. And over the course of the night, he will discover something very sinister about the hotel itself, and the occupants which currently inhabit it...

name: Turnabout Remembrances
description: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves...

name: Flame Land
description: A 2D platformer inspired primarily by Kirby's Adventure and secondarily by classic Sonic. A collectathon with new characters and exits hidden around every corner, and an arcade game in which you compete for high scores. Cute and colorful, snacky and full.

name: My Dog!
description: MY DOG! is a puzzle game where you have to collect puzzles in the form of pictures and memes with the antics and misadventures of a cute dog (My Dog!)

name: Holy Stone Mage
description: This is a mixed type game that can cultivate characters, and battles can be divided into tower defense and duel modes. Players can also enter random maps for exploration, challenge difficult bosses, or discover treasures

name: Ghost Light
description: The ghost Light is a light-spooky, mystery-oriented RPG. You will play as a girl named Mary, exploring dungeons to find escape codes and escape paths in the face of ghosts and traps.

name: DCS World: Kola Map by Orbx
description: Orbx proudly presents the DCS: Kola map, which covers northern Norway, Sweden, Finland, and the Russian Murmansk Oblast and parts of the Karelia region.

name: Stab It VR.com
description: Stab It VR the VR game that CUTS to the PRANK. What's bigger than VR? Videos of people in VR looking like fools Record your friend, dad, or grandma playing Stab It VR for a laugh

name: Puppet Master: The Game - Dark Horse Skins
description: Sin descripción

name: Game of Evolution
description: Game of Evolution: Idle Clicker & Merge Life! Human evolution clicker game! Idle tycoon — merge to create life! Evolution game

name: FightGirl
description: Horizontal fighting, a game of passionate competition.

name: Oopz-Oofs
description: A quirky, playful dog sim where you body-swap with a dog. Waking up from a sweet dream, John finds himself in his dog's body! Sniff, bark, beg, and use paw to interact with the townfolks. Can John find a way to return to his human form, or will this unexpected adventure change them forever?

name: For Hell's Sake
description: For Hell's Sake is a fast-paced 2D platform game where you play as a demon on a mission to break an old contract. Constantly hunted by a superior entity, you will have to move forward. Avoid the traps scattered around the world. Don't get caught. Don't die.

name: Frankie and Suede Private Detectives
description: Get big laughs while you point and click to search for clues and solve mysteries with Hollywood's most deranged private investigators, Frankie and Suede. Be immersed into a cinematic experience with slapstick characters in this film noir comedy adventure.

name: Snaps
description: Dive into an anime-themed FPS and tower defense game! Battle cultists in dungeons, defend your village, and forge relationships with NPCs. Customize weapons and enjoy casino games. A thrilling blend of action and strategy!

name: Crimson Snow Deluxe
description: CRIMSON SNOW DELUXE: A psychological horror RPG where you destroy the world you've created...

name: Little World
description: Explore myths in 'Little World,' a strategic blend of auto-chess and tower defense. Assemble heroes from legend to outwit opponents in a magical realm. Each battle tests strategy, every win showcases your tactical genius.

name: Fairway to Hell
description: Welcome to the Afterlife, where salvation comes with a scorecard. In Fairway to Hell, you find yourself in the most unexpected predicament—dead, in hell, and holding a golf club. Prepare for the most unconventional round of golf you've ever played. Welcome to hell; we hope you like the greens.

name: Galactic Starfire: Squadron
description: Galactic Starfire: Squadron is a Future Sci-Fi Space Shooter game set in different environments around the universe. Complete the challenges and stay alive as you progress through the different types of levels.

name: Pet Crossing
description: A cruiser came to a blue planet and found a planet with many ice-blocked caves, which contained frozen animals that were sent in before the catastrophe. Only paired animals could survive after thawing. The expedition team needs your wisdom to help match these animals and restore life to the planet.

name: Topac Battle: Supporter Pack
description: This content requires the base game Topac Battle on Steam in order to play.

name: Tea for Sana
description: Tea for Sana is an explorable visual novel set in the mountains of a Slavic-inspired fantasy world. Discover recipes, forage for ingredients, and cook traditional dishes to restore the balance between the mountain spirits and the villagers below.

name: Hélène est dans mon Ventre.
description: You follow a troubled girl whose only friend is her talking tapeworm inside her belly. This one will help and advise her in order for her to get closer to the person she loves.

name: Find X
description: "FindX is an all-age suitable first-person casual shooting game, where players need to find differences in two time-frozen and similar worlds, and use a variety of quirky weapons to address these discrepancies."

name: Flaky Love
description: A plot-oriented, full-motion live-action interactive video work, which is different from the traditional fantasy love interactive work. The love, hate, affection, and hatred you gain all depend on your current choices.

name: Tower Networking Inc.
description: An internet service provider simulation game. Design and build network connectivity and services to clients in an ever-expanding randomly generated tower. Configure and maintain equipment to ensure you meet the requirements of tower dwellers. Manage your spending for expansion and daily operations.

name: Timestamps: Lost Love
description: An exciting adult Visual Novel with a unique intriguing story featuring Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Sex, Humour, Character Development and some fun references.

name: Clash for Crust
description: Clash for Crust is a 2-4 Player local multiplayer party brawler. Customize and take control of a Crazy Gull and fight using your Seagull Attacks and Power-Ups to grab the Golden Crust and to battle for the honor of becoming Top Gull.

name: Wish You Happiness
description: Move with 'WASD', switch characters with the number keys

name: Tower! Simulator 3: RJTT Airport
description: As one of the busiest airports in Asia, it facilitates over 85 million passengers annually. Haneda features a sleek, modern architecture with three passenger terminals, which are renowned for their efficiency and high standard of service.

name: Paragon Pioneers 2: Happy Southburghs
description: Makes all Southburghs in the game smile and supports indie development!

name: Egregore
description: Embark on a first-person adventure to a mysterious café in Cairo. Adopt a new perspective and shape reality to your will as you unravel an occult conspiracy hidden in plain sight.

name: Metaball: Face Bundle
description: A set of 3 different face styles. Refresh your mood with a different-looking face than usual! Our face pack is reasonably priced! Don't miss out!

name: Dig a Road
description: This is a puzzle, pixel style game about how to dig a road.

name: Grassassins
description: Gather your crew for an intense 2-4 player showdown in Grassassins, where stealth, cunning, and strategy will determines who is the ultimate Assassin!

name: Paragon Pioneers 2: Turn the Orc Table
description: Swaps all human graphics with orc graphics and vice versa. Support the development of indie games and kick some human butts!

name: Betrayal Beach: Supporter Pack
description: Support the development of Betrayal Beach with the Supporter Pack! Includes several in game character skins.

name: Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Knight Recon: Tracer Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Dynasty Dash
description: Ride a roller coaster built in the middle of the Great Wall of China, while the Imperial Army faces evil hordes of Yaoguai who try to destroy humanity. This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Dynasty Dash - One roller coaster cart

name: The Time Game
description: Bend the rules of time to your while to outsmart and out-think your opponents. Fun 4-player co-op strategy card-game which will leave you on the edge of your seat!

name: Oil Truck Transporter
description: Oil Truck Transporter is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful oil truck.

name: Super Drift Blade
description: Explore the world of Super Drift Blade, a Roguelike game where you can slash with just a swipe of your mouse.

name: Jurnal Malam: Bestfriend
description: In this game, players will play the role of Afdal, a person whose fate is the opposite of Rahmad's, so one night Rahmad asks Afdal to help look after the house, but unfortunately, everything is not fine, because of the terror that Afdal is experiencing.

name: Survivors of Journey to the West: Bald Guy vs Wukong
description: "Survivors of Journey to the West: Bald Guy "vs" Wukong" is a spin off story about the product "Survivors of Journey to the West". The story draws inspiration from the Western Journey to the Wilderness and traditional cultivation system, playing the role of the Flower Monk - Lu Zhishen, who explores the world of Western Journey, freely combining various gameplay and genres through over 200 massive skills and resonance. At the same time, you can also meet Taoist priests, farm and build, recruit young brothers, and fight against enemies together

name: Shop Crush
description: A Dating Sim meets a Shop Simulator. Will they match? You tell me! Open your Shop and sell the best goods you can find to meet beautiful women and men and make new friends. Choose between selling the desired items or making a profit, but try to balance the relationship or the budget!

name: Paint-guin
description: Color 2D and 3D object in a first person shooter, alone or with friends

name: The Last Knight
description: Earth has been seized by aliens! You are the pilot of the last Knight - a gigantic combat robot. Explore the ruins of civilization, battle giant monsters, travel through time, and prevent humanity's defeat!

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 5
description: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with slick and wheelie bars, and Radial tire versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary
description: "Muscle Girl Lisa: Training Diary" is a visual novel game that follows the story of Lisa, a cute girl from the United Kingdom who aspires to be a bodybuilder. Make the right choices to help Lisa grow her muscles and enjoy unique dates with her.

name: Nangol
description: Delve into an ancient tomb to loot it's treasures and unearth the secret fate of it's former inhabitants.

name: Type Galaxy
description: Embark on the ultimate cosmic quest where your typing prowess holds the key to victory! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled voyage through the stars in Type Galaxy, the definitive typing adventure that will leave your fingers itching for more!

name: The Other Side: Tower of Souls Remaster
description: The return of a 2014 classic now fully remastered for modern platforms! Can you resolve a family squabble before the gates to the realm of the dead swing open in this collector's edition of The Other Side: Tower of Souls?

name: Megan's Adventure
description: Megan's Adventure is a 2D platform game, you just have to move, dodge, shoot and enjoy (optional)

name: Soar Up The Charts
description: Soar Up The Charts is a fast-paced rhythm game and arcade style rail shooter where music is your weapon! With tracks provided by Alden Ave and KeepFlying, be ready to turn it up and blast your way through those radio robots!

name: War of the Western Deep
description: Explore a lush, hand-animated world as you solve puzzles, meet intriguing characters, and duel nefarious foes in tense sword battles. Join Mirren, a royal courier sent to the dangerous Border Coast on the eve of war, and immerse yourself in this innovative mix of adventuring and cinematic combat.

name: Numbers.io
description: Navigate a numeric arena in Numbers! Dodge big digits, merge smaller ones, and strive for 2048+ in this addictive, strategy-driven merging game. Start merging now!

name: Carts Battle
description: Race and battle in Сarts Battle! Equip your car with weapons, outmaneuver rivals in thrilling drifts, and dominate the explosive racing arena. Ready, set, smash!

name: OG Memory: Spring 2K24
description: OG Memory: Spring 2K24 is an casual memory game with stunning images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Super Hangman
description: Super Hangman: the ultimate kids' word game! With colorful graphics and exciting challenges, it's a fun way to learn new words. Guess right, avoid the hangman, and expand your vocabulary across various topics. Let the word adventure begin!

name: MeowFall
description: MeowFall is a charming 2D platformer in pixel art style. Take control of an adorable cat, overcome obstacles and uncover the secrets. Are you ready for an adventure to find the best hat ever?

name: Mercenarian
description: In a world full of monsters, always look for better weapons & skillstones that gain your enemy's ability. Even you can spit poison like the poisonous spider, so slash all of them and look for it. Sharpen your weapon, upgrade your status, and gain experience until you become a Professional Mercenary.

name: Gassy Getaway
description: Gassy Getaway is a hilarious office escapade where urgent tasks collide with uncontrollable flatulence! Maneuver through the chaos, complete assignments, and avoid embarrassing encounters with colleagues before dashing to the restroom. Can you keep it together in this laugh-out-loud challenge?

name: G.R.E.G.: The Generally Really Easy Game
description: Welcome to G.R.E.G. - The General Really Easy Game, a minimalistic precision platformer that has some arguably difficult levels

name: Party Party Time 2: Party Spirit Pack
description: Let's show your Party Spirit! Enjoy 10 new minigames!

name: Shrimpwrecked
description: Riding an extra-terrestrial weapon disguised as a guitar, battle to the bottom of the ocean deep to turn the tides of impending worldly destruction; krill or be killed!

name: Mozi
description: In the distant Milky Way galaxy, there hides a mysterious planet named Mozi Planet. This planet has a vast and boundless ocean, and every drop of seawater is shining with a mysterious light, as if telling the ancient interstellar secrets.

name: Toys Cracker
description: Toys come to life to engage in epic battles!A unique 2D fighting game, skillfully blending elements of "Smash Bros" and "Mario Odyssey". Skillfully transfer the soul of your characters and gain advantage by creating the best possible synergies.

name: Siberian Dawn: Heroes of the Union
description: Heroes of the Union adds 8 new Rank 7 Units to the Union Bloc, and also adds the Guard status to the tactics cards. The Heroes can be added in a couple of ways to the game from within the ARK, and all these new cards can be used in all modes except the Training Missions

name: Otherworld Legends: Zilan
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Otherworld Legends: Fluffette
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: Duck Adventures
description: Duck Adventures features 30 levels of exciting gameplay. A game that will not leave you indifferent to the fate of the duck. Who returns home after a long fishing trip.

name: Vector Space
description: It is a game about switching squares to make board full

name: Undercover: Secret Management
description: Help Veronica solve another dark mystery and reconcile with her sister.

name: My Days With Mia
description: Explore 'My Days With Mia,' a visual novel of romance and choice in a vibrant college setting. Connect deeply with Mia through an interactive story, full voice acting, and rich artwork. Experience the thrill and intimacy of college love.

name: Call of the Grave
description: You find yourself in an ancient graveyard, where mysterious statues and forgotten tombs hide ancient secrets. Under the moonlight, you solve puzzles, revealing a portal to dark caves. Inside, dark corridors await you, littered with bodies but no living souls.

name: Soul of the Forest
description: Embark on a quest to unite the forest against the tyrannical king in an hour long, turn based RPG epic! Soul of the Forest was created by a team of 55 students over the course of 2 semesters as a case study of modern turn-based RPGs.

name: WisdomGems
description: WisdomGems is a relaxing and challenging puzzle game where you have to solve temples by moving three gems to their correct square. WisdomGems takes inspiration from traditional games like the Rubik's Cube or the sliding puzzle, providing a minimalistic and intellectual experience.

name: The Pirate's Quest
description: The Pirate's Quest - You go in search of exciting adventures and ancient treasure hidden on a mysterious island. You will explore dangerous seas, coves and ancient ruins in search of a treasure map, face competitors and fight sea monsters.

name: Timeless
description: An exciting strategy action game wherein the player needs to outmaneuver mechanical adversaries in order to guide a cube to an awaiting pressure plate. Each time the player does so, it highens its score. The goal of the game is to get as high a score as possible.

name: SpellRogue: Supporter Pack
description: The Supporter pack decks out each wizard with golden garbs. If you love SpellRogue and want to support us further, buying this DLC will help fuel further development. And, it also comes with our eternal gratitude and thanks for your love and support of SpellRogue.

name: Survive Game
description: This is a relaxing, single player PC survival game where you can chop down trees, hunt, or build cabins to see how long you can Survive with wild animals and ai enemies throughout the large and beautiful map.

name: Strange Labyrinth
description: Amy is pulled into a dimension of labyrinths by the villain Ayashii Meiro, who mysteriously appears on her TV. Now, Amy must solve the puzzles of the labyrinths and defeat Ayashii Meiro to return to her world, collecting fragments of her soul along the way.

name: Midnight Watch
description: Midnight watch: When night falls, creepy shadows creep through the halls and unseen spirits roam. Take up your watch and expose the disturbing truths hidden in the darkness. Will you survive the night, or will the midnight terrors consume you?

name: Bellumentum
description: Ever play a MOBA and wish you could be every one of your teammates? Well, it was DEFINITELY their fault, but time to see if you could do any better.

name: Sorcerer Smackdown
description: In Sorcerer Smackdown, joining the fight is simple: grab a friend, choose a character, and let the match begin! Unleash both physical and magical attacks using the keyboard for commands, mixing and matching moves to craft devasting combos to prevail against your opponent!

name: Sprint Star: A Running Manager
description: We present a running management simulation. Train your hero in different running disciplines, keep an eye on his health and energy level and race against the best in city or hill runs!

name: Seabed Settlers
description: A citybuilder inspired by classics such as Ceasar III, Anno, Pharaoh and others which takes place the bottom of the ocean. The surface has become uninhabitable and raybomb radiation has turned many into mutants. It is your job to set up your underwater empire and guide new humanity to greatness!

name: Iterations
description: Help solve a crime.

name: CrateMage
description: CRATES! PUZZLES! MAGIC!! Bewitch Boxes & Puzzle Puzzles to become the one CrateMage to rule them all as you escape from a Crate infested dungeon filled with all manner of Crate contraptions, Magical Trinkets & LAVA! (No really, there is a lot of lava, like far too much lava).

name: Sense of Darkness
description: Where am I? Is it a dream? The afterlife? Or just a hallucination? You have a rare chance to experience awakening in this adventure VR game. Are you ready to step into the darkness and discover what lies beyond the veil?

name: Take Your Altushka
description: A meme visual novel.

name: Commando
description: A considerably stripped down version of Commando, with a limited amount of enemies onscreen and generally simplified gameplay. The levels have been reduced to only four stages that loop twice, as opposed to the arcade game's eight levels. The arcade game made use of two fire buttons; as the 2600 only has a single fire button, the player has to press fire to shoot and hold to lob a grenade. This version was programmed by Mike Riedel for Imagineering, Inc.

name: Worm Bounce: Worms Jump King
description: Embark on an epic journey with our fearless bouncy worms heroes as they bounce and escape the treacherous underground, navigating a maze of platforms to reach the surface! But beware, a toxic flood is relentlessly chasing them—can you guide the worms to safety?

name: Lea
description: A very short atmospheric horror game that was in development by projectHandsoap until its eventual cancellation.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Season 8 - Journey of Emotions
description: The “Journey of Emotions” season, inspired by Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out, brings a memorable adventure and content to the game, including the brand-new Riley's Mind racing environment! Racers Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness are revving up their engines to take you on an emotion-filled racing challenge.

name: Film Morbid
description:
You wake up in a small and messy room. There's a storm raging outside, with the lightning illuminating a projector in the middle of the room. You investigate the projector, which surprisingly is still equipped with a film reel. You get it going, but you're not sure if that was the best decision...

Do you have what it takes to escape the room and it's looping projector?

Film Morbid is a game made by Point Vertex, during the 8th Black & White game jam. The development of the main game took 10 days.

name: Limbus
description: You continue to wander through an endless looping corridor beside the abyss. Is there a way out... Is there salvation...? You walk on without understanding anything. All you can do is choose the right path. Will there ever be an end to this nightmarish journey.

name: The Memory of Mallet
description: September 2020, Shenyang, where the story begins. Originally the most beautiful youth, it has been cast a faint shadow by the epidemic. Did we make another choice at the time, and our outcome would be different?

name: Makutsu no Liliane
description: Make money by creating zombies! Liliane, a girl who wants to be a necromancer, creates lots of zombies to earn money to be recognized by her demon lord daddy. Sometimes she will mess around with zombies and wolf boys to make boyfriends.

name: FlyKnight
description: Explore, fight, loot and fish! Solo or in co-op mode in this Old School First Person Dungeon Crawler. Earn your knighthood as you oppose the evil witch Lunamoth and stop her curse which prevents everyone from growing wings.

name: Prelude to Freedom
description: Prelude To Freedom is a Metroidvania-style 2D top-down action game.

name: System Upkeep
description: Operate machinery, brew coffee, shovel coal & flick switches in this UNFAIR & CHALLENGING multi-tasking JOYRIDE.

name: Star Child
description: Star Child is an explosive new action-adventure set on a sinister alien planet. Fight numerous aliens and formidable bosses, wield powerful explosives and destructive laser weapons, find secrets and unlock new abilities as you progress. Can you survive your dangerous mission?

name: Sprout of Control
description: Sprout of Control is a puzzle-game that requires wits, patience and timing. You can move in any direction as long as it is not occupied, but while moving, you can't change direction until you hit another solid object. Crawl your way through the levels and use evil fireflies to your advantage!

name: Space Warrior
description: Use your skills and strategy to save your galaxy in Space Warrior, a fast-paced 2D survival game where you fight with alien invaders. Each level presents unique challenges and you need to defeat waves of enemies to survive.

name: Scary Horror
description: "Scary Horror" is an innovative game in the analog horror genre. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an abandoned and cordoned off neighborhood, the only way out of which is to collect all the bottles along the way. Explore the city district and enjoy breakthrough graphics.

name: Questscape: Survival
description: On a secluded medieval, awake in a small village surrounded by wildlife nature and bandits and many challanges. Evolve your land in search of new adventures.

name: Pintaris
description: Pintaris is a multiplayer competitive puzzle game that you can draw different blocks with various paint tool to clear lines and get scores.

name: Parina's Demon Lair Adventure
description: Step into the fantastical world of Parina and embark on an exhilarating journey through realms of magic and mystery! Sharpen your senses as you delve into this captivating hidden object adventure, where every scene is brimming with treasures waiting to be discovered.

name: Snowbound: Dead of Winter
description: Snowbound is a roguelite farming game with tower defense elements. Build your farm, survive the night with a range of defenses, and complete missions to progress deeper into the forest.

name: MonsterLife
description: Monster Life is a high degree of freedom role-playing game where you will become a newly arrived monster in Demon King City, embarking on adventures in a fantasy world from a unique perspective, exploring the world, enhancing your strength, and collecting a variety of collectibles.

name: Ninja Ball
description: Welcome to Ninja Ball, where you can step into the arena and unleash your inner warrior in an unparalleled multiplayer experience! Dive into the fast-paced, action-packed world of Ninja Ball, a game that blends athleticism, strategy, and combat into one adrenaline-fueled adventure.

name: Extra Cream
description: Run your own LEWD coffee shop

name: Simple Fight 2
description: Match Man roguelike

name: Project Rope Tool
description: Play as Arya: junker, ship jockey, and fighter. Lacking working thrusters, her ship is equipped with her latest contraption, the Rope Tool — a grappling hook and a stapler duct taped together.

name: Merge
description: Merge is a minimalistic and easy to understand puzzle game... The goal is simple; Merge...

name: Fast Food: Restaurant Simulator
description: Catering business is full of challenges, sacrifices and overwork. Still when the clients reserve tables in your diner like crazy, you get enormous satisfaction from your hardships. Build your own Fast Food haven and watch it transform into an empire.

name: System Shooterz
description: A top-down arena shooter in space where every decision you make can lead to victory...or crushing defeat! Make every shot, rocket thrust, and planet orbit count! Destroy the enemy motherships circling the system in deep space before their drones overwhelm you and exhaust your ship's resources.

name: Happy Uppen Sometimes Downsad
description: A soul-crushing, non-linear, foddylike Miseryvania.

name: Planetoid Evasion
description: Planetoid Evasion is a SCI-FI action shooter. You are controlling a swat member who was kidnapped by aliens and brought to their planet. Your goal is to escape the planet by any means necessary.

name: Ilíada Espacial 2
description: Destroy hordes of enemies and save Sivinina in this RPG-Space Shooter hybrid!

name: Swing Game
description: A silly game about swinging!

name: It Happened At Night
description: It Happened At Night is a short horror game where the player must complete basic objectives to advance the story and immerse themselves through the eyes of the protagonist.

name: Total Zugzwang
description: This is Chess on a conveyor belt -- an ingenious roguelike, melding tactical strategy and explosive action! Deal with a mind-bending scrolling board that pulls towards you relentless waves of foes and perils. Prepare for their violent collision with your pieces. Prepare for Total Zugzwang.

name: Death Sword Spirit
description: In this mesmerizing gray brown game,

name: Cyborg Force
description: As a member of mankind's most top-elite military corps, your mission is to save the universe, no less.Cyborg Force is a classic arcade run'n'gun that will give you a healthy dose of shooting, platforming and score hunting.Good luck, soldier!

name: Pozionista
description: Travel through a world surrounded by nature, collect plants and use them to create potions, invent new recipes, sell potions in stores and explore the world.

name: Planet Game
description: Tired of making watermelons in 2D? Then the next step is to make a sun in 3D!

name: Primal Survival Wars
description: Build your own Settlement of Ancient People. Survive, Hunt, Gather, Craft Tools, Fight, Research new technologies and face the challenges that the environment throws at you.

name: Rosemary
description: Rosemary is a first person psychological horror game. Delve into the eerie depths of an abandoned psychiatric facility to unravel the mysteries behind the longing presence of spirits and demons, years after its closure.

name: My Poodle's Diary
description: Step into the gentle world of "My Poodle's Diary," where the life of a black standard poodle named “Calm” unfolds through a series of short stories.

name: Tow Truck
description: Tow Truck is a 3D car game. You got a job as a tow truck driver and it's your first day! You've received your first order and you can't screw it up! Get behind the wheel of your vehicle and go to your first job!

name: The End of History
description: A Strategy RPG where you live freely in a vast medieval feudal-simulated sandbox. Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, serve, own a territory as a noble, usurp the throne, endless wars, and betrayal. The intertwining of your and numerous NPCs' intentions creates unique stories.

name: Find the Lost Lights
description: Embark on an epic journey with Mono to retrieve the Lost Lanterns and restore light to the realms of Lunaris, Arcadia, and Luminis. Face unique challenges and formidable enemies in this thrilling platformer!

name: Toilet Party
description: New generation mechanics for 2-8 players! We were inspired by the most played TREND modes!

name: Metro Gravity
description: Explore, fight, solve puzzles and bend gravity to escape the dream-like world of the Halls! Metro Gravity is a mind-boggling musical adventure with rhythmic combat and compelling lore.

name: Getaway Grand Prix
description: Swipe gems and escape the law as a Getaway driver in a thrill ride of HIGH-SPEED MOTOR HEIST MADNESS!

name: Fun Gus
description: Survive the absurdity in Fun Gus.

name: Iso-Core
description: Farm, craft, build, and explore a Beautiful isometric pixel art world. Explore new places and find new biomes to expand your list of items, buildings, and recipes.

name: Space Zone
description: The world's first science-based photorealistic interactive 3D planetarium that models the entire Universe, using procedural generation for uncharted areas.

name: Pirate Combat Trainer
description: You command a small sailing vessel. Take on endless waves of enemy pirate ships as you battle to keep your ship alive. Maintain a tactical advantage as you attempt to survive on the high seas. Destroy as many ships as you can to achieve a highscore to prove your naval aptitude.

name: Oedoshigusa
description: You are a kunoichi who sneaked into Oedojou. If you think it's not Japan, turn back. If you think it's Japan, don't turn back. Escape from patrolling soldiers.

name: Open The Doors
description: Find the code, Solve the puzzle, open the door.

name: No Way Out
description: "No Way Out" is an intense and thrilling survival horror game where players take on the role of a volunteer trapped in a panic-stricken hospital. Players must bravely face their fears, explore various areas of the hospital, and search for a way to escape while uncovering the truth behind the events.

name: Survivor in the Forest
description: Survivor in the Forest is a 3D puzzle adventure game with clicker elements. You find yourself alone with nature and must overcome all obstacles to get out of the forest.

name: Squash Sport Game 2024
description: With Squash Sport Game 2024 you can enjoy the most exciting and fastest racket sport playing in four different scenarios and against six players until you get the best score and leave your name to remember.

name: Prison Fights Simulator
description: Prison Fights Simulator - a game about survival in a brutal prison, fight until you kill everyone or die, no one relaxes in the prison!

name: Hell Miners
description: Hell Miners is an action-packed 2D platformer roguelite where you dodge traps, defeat monsters and collect gold to build on your arsenal of powers, all while ascending to greater heights!

name: Skyfort
description: This game is a arcade block placing game mixed with action-packed Tower Defense gameplay mechanics. Build forts out of tetrominoes high up in the sky and defend it against the incoming waves of airships, by shooting at them with your minigun and building defenses!

name: CyberHoney
description: Players can choose up to 4 heroes to fight. In hundreds of random levels, there are nearly 100 types of enemies and dozens of powerful Bosses waiting for your challenge. Each character has unique weapons and skills. Using different weapons can change character's attack range,

name: Oil Strike '75
description: Get ready to earn while you learn in Oil Strike ’75, a fun, exciting, and educational new game from Cadal Corp! Run an oil rig and discover new oil deposits at the bottom of the sea – no matter the cost. Who knows what you’ll find!

name: Release Me
description: Blast through hordes of mechanized enemies with spells and upgrades in this roguelite game. Choose your hero and delve into a sprawling skill tree, unlocking devastating magic attacks and obtaining powerful upgrades.

name: Suika Jelly Game
description: Merge cozy and bouncy fruit jellies to create watermelon. The goal of the game is to merge watermelons and watermelons. How many watermelons can you merge?

name: Mind the Abyss
description: Mind the Abyss is a fast-paced movement shooter that combines fourth-dimensional abilities and ever-evolving weaponry within an alien planet.

name: Sun City
description: Losing your father a few years after your mother's death caused great trauma to you. You wanted to go to the house of the step-aunt, who lives in SunCity. That's where your intrigue, sex, fun and career adventure starts for you.

name: Moon Thirst
description: A lonely ancient vampire who was banished into the tangled and dangerous dark forests by the forces of ancient magicians. Left without your normal strength, you must explore cursed forests, encounter and defeat various enemies and creatures.

name: Underground Prisoner
description: Underground Prisoner is a necromancer's journey through a world of dangerous adventures in search of a precious soul herb that can summon and control the souls of the dead. Explore dark forests, abandoned cemeteries and dungeons, fight terrible monsters.

name: Ultrakanoid
description: Ultrakanoid is an exciting game that will allow you to immerse yourself in a nostalgic atmosphere. In this game, you will control a platform and juggle fish, which must break blocks on the playing field to complete the level.

name: Effective Immediately
description: All intergalactic travel passes through the orbital relay checkpoint. Verify ID discrepancies, repair vehicle systems and struggle against ethical dilemmas as you negotiate a shifting political landscape. Report for duty, effective immediately.

name: Saku the Covert Agent
description: As an elite hacker, you have received an anonymous commission. You will collaborate with the special agent "Saku" from an unknown organization to complete a thrilling cross-border mission.

name: Shop Town Dooter
description: A chaotic party top-down shooter. In arenas that throw different surprises every round, find a way to out-perform your friends, even if it means cheating, bribing, or bringing a MECH to a gunfight! Upgrade your guns mid-fights for maximum results. - no refunds in case of friendship destruction.

name: Wanderer's Shade
description: Embark on a mysterious journey in 'Wanderer's Shade: Path of the Void,' a 2D pixel art and adventure game that blends intricate puzzles with deep narrative exploration. Discover secrets, solve challenges, and uncover a story of forgotten identities in an enigmatic world.

name: Sky Mad
description: Futuristic jet fighter combat racing game.

name: Pyramid Game
description: Pyramid Game inspires you to comprehend the real world in the game, hope you find your position in the pyramid early!

name: Jade Guardian
description: Jade Guardian - You take on the role of an unusual guardian made from precious jade who goes on a dangerous adventure to return stolen magical signs.

name: Data Man
description: Data Man is a new game for the original 8-bit NES console that brings arcade action to a home console.

name: Uncharted World
description: Uncharted World - In the role of an experienced and brave explorer, you set off on an exciting adventure through uncharted lands. Your task is to explore vast expanses, explore wild forests, explore mountain ranges and explore mysterious deserts.

name: PacaPomo
description: PacaPomo is a cozy productivity app where you raise alpacas and cultivate a farm, all driven by the Pomodoro Technique!

name: Slip 'n Slime
description: Slip and slide around in this slimey pixel-art puzzle adventure! Slide around the level and only stop when you run into something -- SPLAT! Avoid pits and spikes while navigating obstacles, changing your size, picking up obstacles, and.. of course.. pushing boxes. Available in ALL languages!

name: Déjà Vu I
description: Sin descripción

name: Déjà Vu II
description: Sin descripción

name: Alpha Chimp: Episode 1 - The Jungle
description: Alpha Chimp is an action game where you play as a chimp and complete missions to finally challenge the current Alpha. Explore 3D environments and battle other chimp tribes, poachers, loggers and even aliens! The extra "Battle Mode" allows you to select what kind of enemy and what kind of scene you want to battle in, for quick fun mindless play. Try it NOW!

name: Extreme Car Parking!
