description: Prove you're an expert driver in Extreme Car Parking! In each level, you will face a bunch of obstacles on the road. There are orange cones, barriers, and other vehicles to avoid. See how quickly you can stop in the parking spot!

name: Creep Kick
description: Creep Kick was an unlicensed clone game of Kick the Buddy which replaced Buddy with the Creeper from Minecraft.

name: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger
description: Ninja Sentai Kakuranger is a game based on the TV series Ninja Sentai Kakuranger released for the Sega Pico. Not much is known about the game currently due to lack of preservation.

name: The Tale of Two Nekos
description: The Tale of Two Nekoes is a 2D RPG game with 3 stories to play through; Dante's Tale, Akari's Tale, and the Final Tale. This battle system is inspired by the first 6 Final Fantasy games while also having some original aspects as well.

name: Tactic Legends
description:
Tactic Legends is a revolutionary card game that combines strategy, skill, and a touch of luck. Our game introduces a unique collection of cards and innovative mechanics that will captivate both new and experienced players.

Tactic Legends is an exhilarating online turn-based card game where strategy and skill are your greatest allies. Engage in intense battles against players worldwide, and prove your mettle by unlocking and collecting powerful cards from all collections to complete your ultimate decks.

name: Goddess Connect
description: Goddess Connect is a cute anime-style idle game where you dive into a never-ending adventure to collect Heroes, defeat Devils, and become a Legend. Your actions will influence the world around you—come meet these heroes now!

name: N3Rally
description: 'N3Rally' combines a charming aesthetic with intense racing action. Drive a range of vehicles, from production cars to rally cars, and master various terrains such as tarmac, gravel, and snow!

name: Dolls: The Hunt
description: A cooperative survival horror game where you and your friends must survive being hunted as prey!

name: Nullstar: Solus
description: Be. Faster. You are a corporate scavenger drone, sent to rip through the decaying corpse of a dying world to salvage its nullstar. Master flight, thrusters, and face ancient guardians and hazards in 80 precision platformer levels set in the ruins of a civilization where all is not as it might seem.

name: Intrana
description: Intrana, is an action-adventure FPS game, where the player is tasked with going inside a sick man's body to save him from an alien disease. Explore vibrant environments with fascinating procedurally animated creatures, on your journey to stop this celestial virus!

name: The Awakening of a Villainous Lady: A Crimson and Pure White Romance
description: Step into the role of a young woman who suddenly discovers she's the "wicked rival" in a novel. Navigate the intricate social landscape of an elite academy as you attempt to rewrite your destiny. Can you transform from a predestined antagonist into the author of your own story?

name: Alien Weapon Test Grounds
description: The Alien Weapon Test Grounds (AWTG) is an artificial domain where you can test guns created by other civilizations and sharpen your shooting skills.

name: Futariuum's Gate
description: Experience stunning hand-drawn erotic scenes, deep writing and thrilling battles in Futariuum’s Gate, a story-focused visual novel, engaging deck-building card battler and roguelike RPG! Follow Maya, a well-hung futanari demon hunter and total slacker as she brings balance to Earth!

name: Temporal Cross
description: Combine tactical chess and card gameplay for a unique roguelike strategy experience. Choose your character, refine your deck, challenge bosses, and discover endless possibilities. Each card color triggers unique attribute interactions, unveiling hidden events for new adventures!

name: Watch
description: Watch is a free incremental game combined with collecting wristwatches integrated into Steam inventory.

name: Catgirl Aim Trainer
description: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Catgirls! Shoot the Catgirls with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!

name: Koppun-50
description: Run, jump, dash, and shoot your way through the planet of Koppun-50, stealing your enemies' weapons to survive! Think you have what it takes to defeat 49 other players in this fast-paced battle-royale?

name: Super Dapper Man vs. Furries
description: The Furries must go! Do u really need to know more? Most games have double jump, this one has QUINTUPLE JUMP! Use it to defeat the furries and get "killer combos" that say a funny furry diss and improve your stats until hit. Also there is like, slow motion n' stuff. WISHLIST NOW!

name: Path of Hero. Story of Dartes
description: This fun jRPG will immerse you in a fantasy world. The game makes fun of the clichés of old jRPGs, essentially being a funny parody of the games of our childhood. Immerse yourself in complete absurd satire. Learn professions, hire mercenaries and perform feats as if you were a Hero (Probably).

name: Ruzar: The Dark Stones
description: Embark on a perilous journey in Ruzar - The Dark Stones, the sequel to Ruzar - The Life Stone. Explore mysterious realms and uncover the secrets of the Dark Stones, with enhanced gameplay testing your skills in treacherous dungeons.

name: Rock the Islands
description: Team up with friends and dive into adventure! Rescue dwellers, let them work for you so they farm resources and protect you from enemies. Upgrade your equipment, explore new lands, complete quests and fight evil with glory!

name: Find the Stalker
description: Find the Stalker - a psychological thriller, that is set in a rural village. As our heroine, deal with your dark past, before it deals with YOU.

name: The Duck Pond
description: The Duck Pond is a condensed and relaxing idle game, focused on creating a short handcrafted experience with an ending. Throw food to attract different types of duck, read about them in the duckopedia, and maybe you'll discover the epic giga duck!

name: Pupa
description: • Simple gameplay: just click on the screen for a chance to get new skins. It's easy to learn, but hard to put down!

name: Mission Andromeda
description: Escape from Earth! Navigate procedurally generated levels using your trusty Jetpack and Laser rifle, gather precious Ores to trade and Biomass to fuel your ship "Mole-1" on it's way to the final destination, Andromeda!

name: The Better Deal
description: A visual novel with a captivating story, ultrarealistic images, top-quality animations, and multiple love interests. Dramatic, emotional journey filled with adult content and meaningful player choices that shape unique endings. Both male and female romances await. Dive in and start your adventure!

name: Cam
description: CAM is a fps that has PvP action and a cooperative zombie survival mode, featuring a body camera perspective and realistic graphics. Wishlist and share CAM with friends! Send us proof of wishlist to apply for a exclusive beta access and to test upcoming updates!

name: Abnormal 1999: Sector 49
description: Abnormal1999: Sector 49 is a challenging mystery puzzle game. You play as Sam, searching for your daughter in the abandoned Sector 49. Collect 10 consciousnesses to open the portal and escape.

name: Sky's The Limit: Mah-jong
description: A roguelike deck-building Riichi Mahjong game. Utilize tile trading, special tiles, and status enhancement to build your own deck and aim for an eight consecutive wins (Pa-Ren-Chan)! And then, reach even greater heights!

name: Bedtime Stories 1
description: BEDTIME STORIES 1This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Old School Tower Defense
description: Build and upgrade towers with unique abilities to stop waves of enemies. With the advanced augment system, every 3 rounds you can boost your defenses and create strategies that fit your playstyle.

name: Jazz Out
description: Jazz Out is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS platformer where you use your enemies as your platforms! You'll punch and uppercut your enemies, make them fly, and teleport on top of them to keep up your combo. Bust out from the prison, perfect your escape by playing again and again!

name: The Other Side of the Sky
description: "The Other Side of the Sky" is a short text adventure game with an alternate fantasy setting in a single-line ending narrative mode.

name: Spooky Mansion
description: The mansion stands as a cursed bastion of evil. As the demonologist delves deeper into the mansion's secrets, they uncover a sinister plot that threatens not only their own soul but the very fabric of reality itself.

name: Uprising: Kingdom Come
description: Uprising: Kingdom Come is an immersive survival strategy game set in the turbulent 1800s, where you lead a group of people from bondage to freedom and beyond. Traverse the vast and beautiful countryside of Virginia. As your group evades capture and grows into a massive formidable army.

name: Toonie Tennis
description: Serve, Smash, Slice, Volley in the ultimate arcade Tennis game!

name: Cog Foo
description: A battle-laden automation game where you have to manufacture everything from battle units down to every bullet! Engage in battles to gather survivors. Manage and feed your people. Mine, farm and Optimize production lines. Can you lead your people to victory?

name: Goblington
description: A rogue-lite style city-building game in a relaxed dark fantasy world. Explore your goblin kingdom, find interesting locations and choose your heroes. Defeat hordes of monsters, harvest, build, cook, feed and grow. Good luck!

name: Caribbean Pirates
description: A tactical board game about the battles of sailboats in the Caribbean Sea. Spaniards, Englishmen, pirates, privateers, corsairs and the ringing of piastres and doubloons.

name: The Paradixion: Christmas
description: [The Paradixion: Christmas] is a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.Solve various puzzles with a unique atmosphere and find the hidden elements in the game to gather clues about the story.

name: Bull Looney
description: Save Cow Bella from certain fate in this 3rd person car chasing, bull fighting adventure. Will you get there in time?

name: RantCPU's: ClickBait
description: Welcome to RantCPU's Realm: Click, Collect, Trade, and Treasure! Step into RantCPU's electrifying world and start your quest to build the ultimate RantCPU card set. Every click brings you closer to the legendary Gold. The more you click, the more you win! Are you ready to play?

name: Broccoli
description: Broccoli is a clicker game, in this clicker game, you can click a Broccoli! When you click the Broccoli, you gain even more Broccoli! Every 2 and 10 hours you will get dropped a Broccoli! Every Broccoli is made by the community in the discord, come join us and lets make a great community, together!

name: SphereCats
description: A merge puzzle game about spherical cats, with a twist. Play the classic suika experience or try new variations every day!

name: Hawk Tuah
description: Click as much as you can before the hour passes. The more you click, the more score and better item rarity you get! Join our Discord to collaborate and create unique items. Test your patience and precision in Hawk Tuah!

name: My Fantasy Hostess Club
description: Manage a cabaret where you get paid to talk and eat with customers. How you talk and respond determines the fate of your club. Advertise on the newspaper, do fashion runways, or hang out with the cute hostesses and develop their social skills.

name: Ad Shoot
description: A 2D vertical scrolling bullet-hell shooter game where you shoot down fictional advertisements. Features 7 stages and full Japanese voice acting.

name: Behind The Backrooms
description: Behind the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game

name: Shugendō: Call of the Spirits
description: Shugendō: Call of the Spirits is a 2D turn-based tactical RPG with unique classes and deep character customization. Explore a mystifying world inspired by Japanese mythology as you slay yokai and restore corrupted spirits. Shape your own stories and strengthen the bonds within your party.

name: Athralis Tower Defense
description: Defend humanity from the Athral Vanguard in Athralis Tower Defense. As the S.O.D.S. Commander, deploy manned turrets and advanced equipment from orbit to stop alien invasions. Experience intense sci-fi tower defense action and strategic gameplay.

name: Block Rancher
description: Harvest Nature. Make the Goods. Please the Company. ESCAPE THE PLANET. In this sandbox Action-Roguelike you’ll work at a sprawling conglomerate, harvesting creatures and turning them into disposable trinkets for mass consumption.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Amsterdam
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Amsterdam landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Brink of War
description: Brink of War is a fast-paced and realistic first person shooter (FPS) game. Everyone can experience the excitement of confrontation. In this game, you can team up with friends in different modes and maps of varying intensity to fight against enemies and compete for victory.

name: Rampart Defense
description: Rampart Defense is a classic tower defense game where you strategically deploy troops and vehicles to protect your colony from waves of enemies.

name: Dragon Warrior
description: In this game, you're transported into a world of challenging puzzles, set against a tranquil blue backdrop.

name: Brucie's Arcade
description: A retro arcade game bundle where you must manage a restaurant through four mini-games: Ingredient Run, Cooking, Serving, and Stacking Leftovers. Each game offers unique challenges packaged up in a familiar, replayable arcade format.

name: ColdRidge
description: Immerse yourself in a turn-based exploration game set in the mystical Wild West. Strategically plan your moves to navigate cursed terrains, uncover magical artifacts, and explore uncharted lands. Don't be fooled by the calm plains of Coldridge, take a gamble and unveil its mysteries!

name: Chicken Game
description: "What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to win a 1-million-dollar prize?" What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?

name: Frights
description: A Cute Retro-Style Horror Survival Adventure. After a long day at the Riverside Forest, you wandered far from your parents...too far. Now it's nighttime and you can't seem to find your way back. As you follow the sweet voice of a sheep(?!), you fall inside an old, haunted cavern.

name: Sisyphe
description: Join a lonely square on it's journey to renew itself along the route to the top of the mountain. Chip off parts off the square to slowly turn it into a new self. Embark on a slow and soft journey through seven beautiful, visually distinct areas.

name: Horror Storm
description: Unearth chilling secrets in a town's underground hospital.

name: Dream World Adventure
description: This is a cute and casual Roguelike game. Experience a thrilling journey in the dream world! Those seemingly cute little monsters are actually murderous. Use different weapon props to eliminate groups of enemies and survive.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Mushrooms
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Mushrooms - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Archipel Logic Infinite
description: Explore archipelagos and chart the boundaries between land and sea in 「Archipel Logic Infinite」. Dive into grid-based puzzles by marking cells as land or sea. Immerse yourself in story-driven puzzles and endless AI-generated challenges for limitless brain-teasing adventures.

name: Drunken Dragon
description: Welcome to the fantasy tavern simulator where you manage resources, cook meals, and serve unique customers. Unlock recipes, upgrade your inn, and keep your tavern clean.

name: BlastLast
description: Old classic Bomber Man in new point of view! Your goal is simple: Blast all enemies by the bombs. Go alone with up to 8 players or assemble the party in online PvP. Choose one of 4 characters, use your specific ultimate, be smart and create strategies to win.

name: A Totally Realistic Stealth Game
description: Become a stealth soldier fighting through enemy lines using whatever methods you see fit to stay undetected in this first-person shooter. Take a slow, methodical approach or go guns-blazing; as long as you remain undiscovered anything is possible.

name: Monsters of Moldred
description: Monsters of Moldred is a neo-gothic autobattler time and resource management sim. Hire and manage a party of hunters to keep Moldred from falling into ruin while you defeat monsters to awaken the true horror that plagues the land.

name: My Friend Toby
description: How long will you survive before Toby catches you?

name: Lights In The Sky
description: Step into the boots of a fire lookout in this atmospheric first-person horror game. Armed with only a flashlight and a pump-action shotgun, you must survive the eerie alien threat lurking in the shadows. Uncover the dark secrets and unravel the mystery behind the strange happenings in the area.

name: Ten Shot
description:
TEN SHOT is an endless arcade game about basic arithmetic.
Dodge and weave through waves of numbers- or punch them together and add to 10.

name: Squirrels Forest Race
description: Exciting arcade racing game, inspired by the classic Diddy Kong Racing, from the 90s and the graphics of Nintendo 64 games! 6 squirrels need to find the Golden Nuts and get them back. To do so, they must win the Most Fantastic Races ever seen!

name: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum
description: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum is a puzzle-based escape room. Solve puzzles and discover the stories of your ancestors in the books you have inherited.

name: Sample Gunpowder
description: Using a pretty familiar combination of gunpowder, you can create a variety of ammo and powders, this basic system will be responsible for keeping the water flow of a dam stable, allowing you to go to the next levels, and discover the challenges hidden here.

name: Gnomes vs. Knights
description: Clash in the magical Forest of Whimsy! Play as Zigs, a sarcastic gnome wizard with a butterfly net, or Sir Clankalot, a bumbling knight. Catch magical creatures, outsmart your opponent, and decide the forest's fate in this whimsical online PvP adventure. Magic or might – who will prevail?

name: Fox Quest: The Elemental Keys
description: Fox Quest is a puzzle game in which you can move between a real and an alternate world. Using this ability you can change the game environment in one of the worlds causing surprising results in the other!

name: Town Rhapsody
description: In the "Town Rhapsody", players play the role of a struggling young man who, through unremitting efforts and high emotional intelligence, is promoted and paid a raise. More importantly, they share beautiful memories with the girls in the town.

name: Run The Words
description: Ever read a book and found your eyes running across the letters and jumping over the spaces? You will after playing Run The Words.

name: Ascendant Dawn
description: Ascendant Dawn is a grand strategy game where you lead a nomadic tribe in a brutal bronze age world. Work your way up from a small clan to a great empire by founding cities and conquering your enemies.

name: Growth Fish
description: Easy fish action game.Eat the food, increase the fish population, make the fish bigger and survive.

name: Tiles Puzzle
description: A simple and difficult puzzle game where you have to turn all the squares purple.

name: Landlord and the Tenants
description: In Landlord and the Tenants, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (NTR Ending) depending on how you play.

name: Dragon Heartburn
description: That pizza at lunch was a mistake... Dragon Heartburn is a mix of a top-down shooter and a puzzle game. The dragon gets heartburn in the middle of the workday and needs to get to the infirmary without harming his co-workers!

name: Deepest Trench
description: Explore the hidden mystery of the Mariana Trench. An underwater local co-op game with immersive storytelling, stunning visuals, and dynamic gameplay, ‘Deepest Trench' offers an unforgettable adventure that challenges your skills and intellect.

name: Arkhaanis One
description: In this mechanically challenging 2D hack and slash game, survive through waves of enemies in an ever increasing difficulty, having the satisfaction of feeling your improvement as you learn the enemies and adopt new strategies to deal with them.

name: Crazy Bike Hill Racing
description: Crazy Bike Hill Racing: Unleash Your Inner Daredevil

name: Tehawar Puzzle!
description: Tehawar Puzzle! is a simple, relaxing jigsaw puzzle game with original gameplay mechanics. 90 high-quality images to unlock, mostly featuring beautiful women in bikinis in fantasy settings (all images are SFW).

name: GreenGrocer Simulator
description: GreenGrocer Simulator: Manage your own greengrocer shop! Sell fresh produce, satisfy your customers, and expand your business in this realistic and engaging simulation game. Experience the joy of running a successful greengrocer!

name: Infernal Bloodrush
description: INFERNAL BLOODRUSH is a 2.5d first-person doomlike where instead of shooting bullets, you spew flames. As demons threaten to spill into the world, it's up to you to protect the Realm by burning every demon to ash.

name: Celestials Door
description: Celestial's Door is a psychological horror game where you, as a desperate husband, search for your missing wife, Dee.

name: Best Gun
description: Best Gun is a light-hearted arcade flight action game featuring both single-player and multiplayer content. Fly (or walk) and take part in fights, mini-games, races, and more.

name: KillerNight
description: Killer Night is a psychological survival thriller where a group of death row inmates face extreme trials in an isolated mansion to gain freedom. Among them lies a ruthless killer. Will you be able to discover the killer's identity before it's too late?

name: The Tree of Immortality
description: Awaken as a humble farmer, lost and bewildered in a dense dark forest, before a giant tree. within the darkness are sinister spirit beasts that emerge from the shadows, threatening your survival. Battle these monsters, gain experience, explore and grow stronger before the next wave starts.

name: Monkey Mischief
description: Monkey Mischief is a multiplayer hand locomotion based VR game that has little bits of everything.

name: Obsessed With The Streets
description: A next-gen open world street racing game. Defeat your rivals, earn their cars, customize them, repeat!

name: Junkyard Killbots
description: Junkyard Killbots is a rogue lite auto battler where where you build robots, equip killer items, and smash your enemies. Manage your robot army by combining items to upgrade their power or spreading them out between your bots. Scavenge new items, find new blueprints, and discover new combos!

name: Skeleton Hell
description: Skeleton Hell is a cooperative horror game where you and your friends must work together to find your missing organs and reclaim your humanity. Using your skeletal form, you can solve puzzles and collaborate with each other to escape, while avoiding the dangers that lurk within!

name: Photo Playhouse
description: This is a 2D pixel action game where the protagonists defeat bosses. Players can switch between four different characters, each with multiple skills, to experience the thrill of combo attacks and the excitement of combat.

name: Brentwood
description: Brentwood is a story-based 2D point and click adventure game.Through your journey you will uncover hidden secrets and your choices will shape the destiny of both characters and the world around them, leading to multiple endings that show the impact of your decisions.

name: Click the Chick
description: The chick hungers for the click! Are you ready to click it and be the clicker of the chick?! Chirp, Chirp, Chirp!

name: Grab and Guts
description: Grab and Guts - Shooter about JuraPis' journey through the human body, microscopic world, and unimaginable liquids and corners of light. Use your grappling hook to navigate, gather weapons, and eliminate parasitic enemies.

name: Astrum Vanguard
description: In Astrum Vanguard, a captivating 2D arena shooter, you pilot a spaceship through space as countless enemy ships and alien creatures relentlessly attack you. Survive the endless onslaught in the cosmic battlefield!

name: The Hawkers
description: The Hawkers invites you to transform a forgotten farm into an agricultural empire. Build your store from scratch, cultivate unique crops, and uncover the story behind your family's legacy. Can you save the town from Mr. Bunny's wicked schemes?

name: Merge Mango
description: Mango is a delightful game where you merge Mangoes! Every 3 and 18 hours, receive a surprise Mango to grow your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?

name: Last Day to Die
description: The game offers intense survival gameplay where you and your friends must battle zombies by night and fend off bandits by day in a post-apocalyptic world. Work together to survive!

name: Record Shop Simulator
description: Welcome to Record Shop Simulator! Design and run your dream record store, selling vinyl, gear, and more. Customize everything from decor to inventory, manage your store with care, fend off shoplifters, and tackle dynamic challenges. Can you build the ultimate music haven? Find out now!

name: Mini City
description: Reincarnated as an Isekai Lord, you are given a heavenly skill panel that allows you to upgrade your skills to recruit capable people to work with you to solve the threats of the magical beasts you encounter and build your territory.

name: Elder Legacy: Survival
description: Elder Legacy: Survival is a fun cooperative open-world survival game where you and your friends will find ways to defeat bosses and progress through biomes together.

name: Don't Drop The Wall, Jack!
description: In this construction game, you’ll play as Jack, a proud contractor. Using his crane, Jack will build various structures, including houses, hotels, and bridges. Skillful crane operation is crucial for progress and achieving new objectives. But above all, be extra careful with your walls!

name: PinDrop
description: In Pin Drop, players explore a dark world to find the true door. The journey is full of tension as they move through creepy settings while avoiding danger. Random objects can spawn and create noises, which can wake up zombies.

name: Sunbeam Feast
description: Sunny is a creature that loves the Sun Fruit. Embark on a charming journey in a colorful and fiery world. Don't be deceived, Sunbeam Feast is inspired by classic precision platformers with many challenges and increasing difficulty.

name: Tape 101
description: Tape 101 is a psychological Horror game that dives in the Backrooms, explore, interact, solve some puzzles and find your way through the Eerie minimalistic seemingly infinite realms with the help of your RC-Car in hope of finding a way out, yet is there anything to unveil ? can you make it out ?

name: One Night At The Shack
description: One Night at the Shack is a psychological horror adventure where you explore a sinister shack haunted by vengeful spirits. Engage in intricate puzzles tailored to each ghost's tragic story, unraveling mysteries and uncovering the dark truth behind their haunting.

name: Tokyo Coffee: Grinding in the Pandemic
description: Remembering the COVID-19 pandemic... It started in the year 2020. The events that unfolded in a cafe in Tokyo are now a nostalgic memory. Sit back, brew yourself a hot cup of coffee (or tea), and immerse yourself in the stories of the staff and different customers who visited the cafe.

name: Games Advent Calendar 2024
description: Jump on a train packed with gifts and dive into the holiday spirit with Games Advent Calendar 2024!

name: Never Play Evil
description: Step into the dark and twisted world of "Never Play Evil," an action horror noir game that combines puzzle-solving, exploration, and thrilling combat. You will have to unravel every mystery hidden within the eerie mansion as you navigate its corridors and confront the forces that lurk within.

name: Silicon Valley SImulator: 1980s
description: Dive into a journey from a garage entrepreneur to tech mogul in 'Silicon Valley Simulator: 1980s.' Begin amidst the dawn of personal computing, innovate groundbreaking technologies, and navigate the highs and lows of the volatile tech industry.

name: When The King Speaks
description: Recruit over 65 characters in this turn-based RPG! A living world in which you decide the time of events!

name: Commandos Dreams
description: Dive into a world of challenges with 'Commandos Dreams'! This demanding 2D arcade game puts you in control of a jetpack, requiring you to navigate meticulously and push your skills and reaction time to the limit.

name: Sheep Adventure
description: Control a cute sheep in this 3D arcade game and help it reach the safe green meadow, avoiding passing cars and dangerous lakes. Go through exciting levels of increasing difficulty, testing your reaction skills and agility. Are you ready to become the hero of this exciting adventure?

name: A Night With: Bartender
description: Spend a night with Ivy, a charismatic and skilled bartender, and navigate through an evolving relationship.

name: Bug Splash TD
description: Ignite enemies with fire, shatter their defenses or simply knock them into the next wall in this strategic tower defense experience. Defend your gate against ... well who guessed it ... bugs! Use a variety of towers, each with it's own special effect to keep them at distance!

name: Monsuta
description: Vast action RPG bullet-hell where you take part in an adventure to defeat the evil Monsuta and restore peace to the world.

name: Gnomer
description: The gnomes got no chance ! Drop down through levels filled with hostile gnomes. Kill gnomes, upgrade your gear and buy buildings that will help you on your Journey.

name: Innerscape
description: Play as Dr. Alan Miles, a parasite investigator, in a survival horror quest inside a critically ill alien. Use wits to battle biological horrors, uncover sinister truths, and survive.

name: Hop 'n' Marty
description: Hop 'n' Marty is a retro 3D platformer for the modern age. Journey through sprawling worlds to find all of the collectables and meet the eccentric inhabitants within. Rescue the captured pygmies who have been trapped in cages and bring them back to safety.

name: Desert Racer
description: Are you a good driver? A game to test your reaction speed. The player controls a car, the speed of which is gradually increasing. It is necessary to turn and collect gasoline cans in time.

name: Greedy Bee
description: Greedy Bee - The game is a mix of clicker and platformer genre, the player will have to maneuver and calculate his actions, dodge traps and get the necessary bonuses for the passage of 40+ levels.

name: Deep Space Survivor
description: Survive massive amount of enemies in space in this top-down action auto-shooter.

name: Hyperacusis
description: A first person horror game where you are an urban explorer that snuck into an abandoned hospital to make content, but little did you know that you are not alone.

name: Fisher Guy
description: Fisher Guy - A game with a top view, where the player as a fisherman must catch fish and deliver it to the chef's bucket, but only he will be hampered by eco-activists who are against your fishing, they have taken over all the islands!

name: Shoe It All!
description: Shoe it All is a multilinear physics-based adventure game where you rebel against the world with the help of a SWING and SHOES!

name: Trainer Eyes VR
description: Let's workout with a girl! Are you ready for the first-ever workout/rhythm/simulation game?

name: Slime Princess
description: Slime Princess is a pixel style stand-alone game that combines platform action, dungeon exploration and Roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a heroic slime and embark on a challenging adventure in order to save the slime princess who has been kidnapped by evil forces.

name: Day of Invasion: Reloaded
description: Day of Invasion: Reloaded is a First Person Zombie-Shooter that takes place within the Horton-Genetics Disaster of Milespring. Find Weapons to fight your way through hordes of Infected!

name: Lift Attendant
description: Lift Attendant is a minimalist puzzle game where you control elevators to transport passengers to their destinations. Your objective is to transport passengers as efficiently as possible. Earn money based on your efficiency and use money to upgrade your elevators to further improve efficiency!

name: Civita
description: Civita is multiplayer FPS game Enjoy easy and fast movements using the rope action. Long TTK is a bonus! (Only supports Steam multiplayer)

name: Hold My Pistaches
description: A dynamic card game where each player becomes a wizard with unique abilities. Use powerful spells, tactical moves and card combinations to defeat your opponents and become the winner!

name: Nocturnal 2
description: Nocturnal 2 is a fast-paced, 2D Metroidvania. Ignite your sword and explore the dark depths and towering heights of a forgotten island that consumed itself long ago.

name: Commando Collection
description: This is a collection of 2D horizontal action shooters. Players take on the role of Allied soldiers, traveling through the major battlefields of World War II, using a variety of advanced and even exaggerated weapons, sweeping through enemy positions and defeating powerful enemy bosses.

name: Profanity Police
description: 90s inspired 2D platformer with robots that cuss at you if you jump on their face.

name: Dark Ascent
description: Dark Ascent is designed to be a test of skill, patience, and perseverance. Every decision counts, and you must learn from your mistakes to climb higher.

name: Kyvedy Guardiah
description: Kyvedy Guardiah is a challenging story rich action jprg, where you have only 7 days to save humanity. Explore an ancient tower, battle in a world in turmoil, fight dark enemies and save your friends. With ever changing mechanics and a deep story that unfolds each passing day. Can you Save Humanity ?

name: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection
description: Artifact Seeker: Resurrection is a 3D Roguelike Survivor RPG game. Aurorium continent is just a board of gods game. You can obtain artifacts by slaying enemies. How to use the power of artifacts, to play the game of gods? To end the game ? Or just be a god yourself. Artifact Seeker, Your choice.

name: Summer Sex Saga
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of summer vacation with Summer Sex Saga! Head to sunny beaches, enjoy the sea breeze, and dive into unforgettable adventures.

name: Multi-Path
description: Connect the dots to find the path. Move the dots to draw a curve that passes all the gates. You will always find a path to a goal. All it takes is a little imagination. Just relax and play. Let's start your journey to lead the light.

name: Aurye Clicker
description: You must collect Auryes! Use all the power at your disposal! Keys, taps, buttons, anything, and then create as many dice as possible, inflict colossal damage, and capture increasingly epic elemental creatures in this universe filled with magic, grimoires, and madness!

name: Maze Keeper
description: You are the guardian of a cursed labyrinth and must prevent an adventurer from escaping with the help of your monsters. But the adventurer keeps trying again and again, accumulating levels and getting stronger... Survive to the highest possible level !

name: Quacker Bros: First Heist
description: Defend your loot from chicken mafias in this chaotic roguelike tower defense. Recruit unique duck defenders and unleash a barrage of wild attacks to protect your treasure!

name: Ape Escape M
description: Ape Escape M takes the core concepts of the console Ape Escape games and brings them into a 2D game with an overhead perspective. The story is similar to the original Ape Escape in that it has you playing as Spike as he tries to stop Specter and his army of apes, but it does take place after the first game. In each level, you’re tasked with capturing most of the apes with your net before you can advance. You also have other gadgets, such as the stun club, radar, and slingshot that can be used to track the apes and stun them for easier capture. As you explore each level, you can find healing items, items that grant additional lives, and enemies that can only be defeated and not captured. Some levels also have doors that lead back to hidden areas in previous levels if you can find the key to unlock them. There are 121 apes in total to catch across five different worlds and in-game achievements can also be unlocked based on the player’s accomplishments.

name: VS Mahjong: Otome Ryouran
description: A Mahjong game developed by Kaneko where you can play 1V1 Strip-Mahjong as one out of the twelve Japanese high school girls on the roster. Each one participates in a different after-school club. Win any of them on this slightly dishonest arcade to sneak a peek!

name: Crimson Tides of Tethyr: Enhanced Edition
description: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. A 20-hour adventure with a colorful cast of characters, epic war storyline, and tactically challenging encounters inspired by Baldur's Gate, this enhanced edition features rewritten dialogue, visual improvements, bug fixes, new systems and quality-of-life improvements, a new hour of gameplay content, and 100 new lines of voiced dialogue.

name: Siege of Shadowdale: Enhanced Edition
description: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. This new version features rewritten and expanded dialogue, new quests, new areas to explore, and the addition of several henchmen, as well as a new world map and completely overhauled graphics.

name: Growl
description:
Genesis port of Taito's arcade beat'em up Growl.

Main diference, is that the Geneis version of Growl is single player only game, instead of up to four simultenous players.

name: I Wanna Win!
description: Do you like to win? Then, this game is for you! Win 25 various levels which require thinking, accuracy, speed, attention, and be the best!

name: Tech Store Simulator
description: Run your own electronic shop! Stock shelves with the latest tech gadgets, set prices to attract customers, handle payments, hire and manage staff, and customize your store layout.Create the ultimate tech shopping experience in your Tech Shop Simulator!

name: Super Slime Seriously Sticky Sassy Scripted Survival Simulator
description:
Get a closer look into the daily hazards of a common slime during their life (and death). Adapt. Survive. EVOLVE. Not just your character, but your mind as you come to figure out the ins and outs of this cute little puzzlish- simulator. Die, repeat and learn from your mistakes!

A gamejam game created by Riazey for the Go Godot Jam 3!

name: 3D Pets Vol 1
description: 3D Pets Vol. 1 is a compilation of two educational games on a single CD: PC Pup and Splat! The Cat.

name: IdleMMO
description: An idle MMORPG experience. Go on an epic adventure, hunt diverse enemies, embark on dungeon expeditions, and defeat world bosses even while taking a nap!

name: Exhausted Man and Candleman Bundle
description: Two heroes of the ordinary.

name: 3D Pets: Splat! The Cat
description:
3D Pets: Splat! The Cat is one in a series of nine virtual pets released by Neechez Innovation Limited.

All the games play in a similar manner. When installed the player has two new programs in the Windows Start menu, hatch.exe and, with this game, pcpet.exe. All creatures are first hatched, there are nine cats to hatch but only one can be alive at a time and the game only allows the player to hatch egg number one when the game is first played.

Each virtual pet needs at least ten minutes attention per day and if treated well it lives for sixty days at which point it becomes an egg again at which point a new egg is hatched and the process of training begins all over again. The game screen consists of a background around which the cat moves, in the upper left is a fish skeleton which is a hotspot for the game control menu, in the upper right is a question mark which opens the in-game help. The game control menu comprises a series of numbers and icons, the numbers show the cat's current status, some of the icons move the player from one location to another while others turn the cursor into one of the cat's toys.

The game is basic and quite easy to play, thought buttons appear over the cat's head showing whether it's hungry or wants to play. When in the kitchen the player can open a cupboard to get cat food, or they can open the fridge to get milk, to put into the feeding bowls. In the TV room the TV can be turned on to entertain the cat and if the fire is lit the cat will fall asleep in front of it. If the player is unable to play with their pet for a few days the game has a 'babysitter' function which automatically cares for the cat until the owner returns. The game also allows the player to play 'Connect 4' with their pet.

name: 3D Pets: PC Pup
description:
3D Pets is a game where the player takes care of a variety of different creatures.

Each 3D Pet begins its life upon hatching out of an egg (yes, a dog hatches out of an egg!) and must be cared for at least 10 minutes per day. If you are unable to play with your pet there is a babysitter feature that does so until you return.

PC Pup is the second half of the first volume in the series, alongside Splat! The Cat.

Once you name your pup, you are free to explore a handful of interactive rooms including a bedroom with a stereo, bathroom with medicine in case the pet gets sick, living room with a television, and a garden where your pet must be trained to 'do its business', as well as others. Little thought bubbles will appear over PC Pup's head indicating what he wants the player to give him, or how he is feeling.

At the end of the pets lifespan, you will see him shrink slowly and then be presented with an 'Angel's Certificate' with stats about the pet's care listed. You may then hatch your next pet and let the circle of life continue.

name: Ticket to Ride Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 1 & 2 - Double Pack
description: A special set of both Fuga: Melodies of Steel 1 and 2 is now available!

name: Flight Attendant Simulator: Onboard Tasks
description: Welcome Aboard! Fasten Your Seatbelt—It’s Going to Be a Thrilling Ride!

name: Dragon Break Classic Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives VS. The Adventures of Valkyrie
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn Hangul!!
description: Educational game teaching you fundamental spelling of Hangul.
